main event: A witness observed a large, metallic, disc-shaped object approximately 100 feet in diameter hovering at an estimated altitude of 50 feet above the ground near Jeffersonville, Indiana on August 7, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as having a silver or metallic gray color.
The object suddenly accelerated and departed the area at a high rate of speed.
The witness stated the object made no sound and displayed no visible means of propulsion.
The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes.
